org.ardenus.discord

Class Discord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.discord.Discord

  • public final class Discord
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to work with the Discord Rich Presence™ API in order to give the game Discord compatibility. Keep in mind if Discord is not installed on the machine no errors will be thrown.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(ArdenusManifest ardenusManifest)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the Discord Rich Presence™ API for the Ardenus Engine. In order for this to properly initialize, the key "Discord-Client-Id" must be present in the Ardenus.MF file.
        Parameters:
        ardenusManifest - the Ardenus manifest.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the Discord pepper key is missing from the Ardenus manifest.

      • respond

        public static void respond(DiscordPerson person,
                           DiscordResponse response)
        Responds to a request sent by a user.
        Parameters:
        person - the person that sent the request.
        response - the response.
